title: How does Grammarly keep my data secure on their servers (at rest)?
content:
Grammarly protects your data on our servers using a combination of technical, physical, and logical security safeguards to make sure your data is safe and secure. This includes encryption, secure network configuration and data transfer, restricted employee access, and several other measures.
